snippet: She embraced the economic discontent that has fueled the rise of her opponents, while presenting herself as the person most qualified to address it.
abstract: Hillary Clinton delivers economic policy speech in which she makes case that she is only candidate who knows how to use levers of government in way that will bring about change in economy for better; speech indicates she will not run with message that Obama-era economy has been success, but rather that she will run as fixer.
lead_paragraph: She embraced the economic discontent that has fueled the rise of her opponents, while presenting herself as the person most qualified to address it.

headline.print_headline: Clinton Says She Is Ready to Fix Fiscal Problems
headline.main: Hillary Clinton’s Message: Yes, the Economy Is Messed Up. But I Can Fix It.
